item.title: Indian Institute of Information Technology, Raichur: Courses, Admission 2025, Placements and Ranking
item.description:
<![CDATA[Click on Apply to check the best colleges that might interest you.
Indian Institute of Information Technology, Raichur: IIIT Raichur, one of the youngest IIITs in India, functioning since 2019 under the mentorship of the Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Hyderabad. Until September 2021, IIIT Raichur functioned from IIT Hyderabad campus and since then it has been shifted to GEC Yermarus Camp, Raichur, Karnataka, a temporary campus.
In December 2022, IIIT Raichur started functioning on its ow...]]>
